title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, January 16, 2020
description: Today is the birthday of poet and memoirist  Mary Karr (1955), who said, "Memoir is not an act of history but an act of memory, which is innately corrupt."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of poet and memoirist  Mary Karr (1955), who said, "Memoir is not an act of history but an act of memory, which is innately corrupt."
